@empatiia

I'm Alex Salom, a Freelance iOS Developer.

I talk Swift and Objective-C. iOS is my passion.

I love designing, setting up and maintaining Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery systems.

I will understand you in English, Spanish and Catalan.

Probably auch auf Deutsch.
